  "body": "Hi Sarah,

Moreover, feedback from the team suggests a strong desire for more opportunities to engage in creative problem-solving. A 'hackathon' style event could be a fantastic addition, allowing team members to work on projects outside their usual scope and present their solutions to the group.

Looking forward to hearing your thoughts!

Best,
John"
